channel.title: CVE Feed for Etoile Web Design -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Etoile Web Design -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-31921|2024-04-15T09:27:06.612Z -- Etoile Web Design -- Ultimate Product Catalogue
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Etoile Web Design Ultimate Product Catalogue.This issue affects Ultimate Product Catalogue: from n/a through 5.2.15.

item.title: CVE-2024-25597|2024-03-15T14:01:44.989Z -- Etoile Web Design -- Ultimate Reviews
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Etoile Web Design Ultimate Reviews allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ultimate Reviews: from n/a through 3.2.8.
